Latest News

16 Jun 16

Yes, we're open!

I'm proud to announce this site is officially up and running.

Welcome dear visitor!

Current version may have some bugs here and there. So if you meet one, please let me know. You can use any social media from contacts, or 'Issues' section on project's GitHub page or maybe even propose a pull request.

4 May 16

Swipeslider - jQuery slider plugin

In order to learn JavaScript and jQuery closer I've decided to develop a plugin. This is an image slider component, that makes a slideshow on a web-page. It's easy to install and use. It's already used on this web-site, see the top block. For more information, please refer this page.
18 Apr 16

Site development progress

Site development continues. I've selected technology stack for this development iteration. Here are list of the technologies:

  • SCSS for styles, because it's easy to learn and really powerfull;
  • Nunjucks as a template engine for HTML. First I thought about AngularJS as a framework for the site, but now I think it's a bit of overkill. Nunjucks on the otherhand has everything I need: macroses, partials, for-each loops and variables;
  • As for icons I've chosen Font Awesome, because it's awesome;
  • Gulp as a build system. It has tons of plugins and syntax that is easy to comprehend (I like that code over configuration idea);
  • For frontend dependancies managment I chose Bower.

This report got it's main goal to check the layout of the news block.
This is an open-source site. Development goes on GitHub. Feel free to fork, explore, give suggestions and point out grammar and other mistakes.
Design and stuff by Alexander Emashev.
